Question: In July 2004, this person became engaged to American dancer Kevin Federline, whom she had met three months before.
Hints: In 2010, this person released her eighth fragrance, Radiance.
In 2001, this person released her third album Britney and played the starring role in the film Crossroads.
In May 2012, this person was hired as a judge for the second season of the American version of The X Factor.
